name: 奥托·卢默
bio_short: 德国实验物理学家。他与恩斯特·普林斯海姆（Ernst Pringsheim）合作，对“黑体辐射”进行了精确测量，为普朗克的量子假说提供了关键的实验数据。
bio_short_en: A German experimental physicist. In collaboration with Ernst Pringsheim, his precise measurements of 'black-body radiation' provided the critical experimental data for Max Planck's quantum hypothesis.
